#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int x[1000001];
int gcd(int m,int n)
{
    if(n)return gcd(n,m%n);
    return m;
}
int main()
{
    int t,i,a,b;
    x[0]=0;
    x[1]=1;
    for(i=2;i<=1000000;i++)x[i]=(x[i-1]+x[i-2])%1000000007;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
        printf("%d\n",x[gcd(a,b)]);
    }
}
